title: Pork and potato curry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1 tablespoon curry paste', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour mixed in 1 tablespoon water', '450g pork fillet, sliced', '1 tablespoon oil, divided', '4-6 potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 medium onion, diced', 'Seasoning', '1/2 tablespoon curry paste', '350ml water']
